member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.GetCities
member.summary: Get the list of cities (city ID and city name) currently in the 'Cities' table

member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.GetCity(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a single city value based on the given ID
member.returns: The matching city if succesful, error if not

member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.PutCity(System.Guid,CititesManager.WebAPI.Models.City)
member.summary: Update data for a specific city
member.returns: Empty result is succesful, error is not

member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.PostCity(CititesManager.WebAPI.Models.City)
member.summary: Insert a new city into the databse
member.returns: Inserted city if succesful, error if not

member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v1.CitiesController.DeleteCity(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete a city from the database
member.returns: Empty result if succesful, error if not

member.name: M:CititesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.v2.CitiesController.GetCities
member.summary: Get the list of cities (city name) currently in the 'Cities' table
member.returns: The list of cities (city name only)
